actions.description: The nosferatu makes two Claw attacks followed by one Bite attack. If both Claw attacks hit the same creature, the Bite attack is made with advantage.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claw

actions.description:
8 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 9 (1d8 + 5) piercing damage plus 7 (2d6) necrotic damage. If the target is missing any of its hit points, it instead takes 11 (2d10) necrotic damage.

The target's hit point maximum is reduced by an amount equal to the necrotic damage taken, and the nosferatu regains hit points equal to that amount. The reduction lasts until the target finishes a long rest. The target dies if its hit point maximum is reduced to 0. A Humanoid slain in this way and then buried in the ground rises as a nosferatu after 1d10 days.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: The nosferatu vomits blood in a 15-foot cone. Each creature in that area must make a DC 16 Constitution saving throw. On a failed save, a creature takes 18 (4d8) necrotic damage, and it can't regain hit points for 1 minute. On a successful save, the creature takes half as much damage with no additional effects.
actions.name: Blood Disgorge (Recharge 5-6)

languages: the languages it knew in life
name: Nosferatu

specialTraits.description: The nosferatu regains 10 hit points at the start of each of its turns if it has at least 1 hit point and isn't in sunlight. If the nosferatu takes radiant damage, this trait doesn't function until the start of the nosferatu's next turn.
specialTraits.name: Regeneration

specialTraits.description: The nosferatu can climb difficult surfaces, including upside down on ceilings, without needing to make an ability check.
specialTraits.name: Spider Climb

specialTraits.description: The nosferatu takes 20 radiant damage when it starts its turn in sunlight. While in sunlight, it has disadvantage on attack rolls and ability checks.
specialTraits.name: Sunlight Hypersensitivity
